description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure two (2) 20,000L Aircraft Refuellers for delivery to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Valcartier, Quebec. The requested delivery date is 120 days after contract award.
full_summary:
## 20,000L Aircraft Refueller Procurement
### Solicitation Number
Solicitation number: W8476-236706/A
Publication Date: July 19, 2023

### Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting proposals for the procurement of two (2) 20,000L Aircraft Refuellers for delivery to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Valcartier, Quebec. The requested delivery date is 120 days after contract award.

### Key Details

* Procurement Category: Goods
* UNSPSC Code: 25100000 (Motor vehicles)
* Tender Status: Expiring
* Contracting Entity: ADM(Mat)/DGLEPM/DLP5-3-4-2
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
* Regions of Opportunity: Global

### Important Dates
* Amendment Date: September 21, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: September 21, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: September 6, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

### Evaluation Criteria
The lowest price will be used as the primary evaluation criterion.

### Trade Agreements
The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Contact Information
For any inquiries, please contact:

* Name: Brian James
* Email: [brian.james3@forces.gc.ca](mailto:brian.james3@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (819) 939-3299

### Documents
The tender documents are available electronically at the following links:

* English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7258/en-rfp-w8476-236706-a---original.pdf](https://canadabuys.can
